Immerse yourself in the wild, untamed beauty of the Scottish Highlands as Merida embarks on her daring journey, with vivid animated scenes every time you open a new tab.

Features:
🏹 Live Wallpaper: Watch Merida’s brave moments unfold in stunning animations, capturing the magic of her story.
🌐 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly access your favorite websites with pre-set shortcuts for convenience.
➕ Addable Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab by adding links to your most-visited sites.

🕒 Calendar & Clock: Stay organized with a built-in calendar and clock display.
Why Choose This Extension?
This extension is secure, easy to use, and respects your privacy. You can uninstall it at any time through the extension settings.

Explore more live wallpapers featuring Disney characters, animated adventures, and fantasy worlds. The menu also includes a note-taking tool, a privacy policy, and a direct uninstall option.
